content: AC-D GS Steel cutting disc General steel cutting disc for gas saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed to make everyday steel cutting with gas cut-off saws quicker and easier Thanks to its premium grain and bond system, the disc is fast, free-cutting, strong and durable Versatile cutting disc engineered for maximum working comfort Applications Cutting steel with gas saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Base material: Steel Tool type: Gas saw Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Base material | Steel | Tool type | Gas saw | Blade / disc shape | Flat, Type 1 ### ITEMS- 436722 - Cutting disc 12x5/32x20 ST SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 436723 - Cutting disc 12x5/32x1 ST SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 436724 - Cutting disc 14x5/32x20 ST SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 436725 - Cutting disc 14x5/32x1 ST SPX - Package Size 10 pc
